mapper.select: select b.no no ,b.title title ,u.name name ,b.hit hit ,to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_date ,b.user_no user_no from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by b.no desc

select b.no no ,b.title title ,u.name name ,b.hit hit ,to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_date ,b.user_no user_no from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by b.no desc
select b.no ,b.title title ,u.name ,b.hit hit ,to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_date ,b.content ,b.user_no user_no from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no}
